actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide that the requirements of such Act with respect to employers shall apply to the Occupational Safety and Health Administration.

summary.text: Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to include the Occupational Safety and Health Administration of the Department of Labor within the definitions of employer and employee for purposes of coverage under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide that the requirements of such Act with respect to employers shall apply to the Occupational Safety and Health Administration.
